title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Physical / Mobility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Physical / Mobility              Physical / Mobility       The following visitor services and facilities are accessible to wheelchair users with assistance.  Overlook Park Paterson Museum Great Falls Historic District Cultural Center Accessible bathrooms are located at the Paterson Museum Guided tours led by the National Park Service, or its designees, can follow paved, wheelchair-accessible routes (assistance may be required, especially along narrow city sidewalks).  Please Note: There are no wheelchairs available to borrow at this time.
